About the job
Qventus is leading the transformation of healthcare operations. We enable hospitals to focus on what matters most: patient care. Our innovative solutions harness the power of machine learning, generative AI, and behavioral science to deliver exceptional outcomes and empower care teams to anticipate and resolve issues before they arise.

Our success in rapid scale across the globe is backed by some of the world's leading investors. At Qventus, you will have the opportunity to work with an exceptional, mission-driven team across the globe, and the ability to directly impact the lives of patients. We’re inspired to work with healthcare leaders on our founding vision and unlock world-class medicine through world-class operations.

As a Solutions Architect of Conversational AI & Prompt Engineering, you will lead the technical design, development, and optimization of AI-driven conversational agents, as well as contribute to broader prompt engineering across other use cases. This role requires expertise in designing robust conversational flows, implementing intent recognition systems, and structuring chatbot logic into modular and reusable components. The ideal candidate will collaborate with cross-functional teams, including data scientists, software engineers, and product managers, to create and maintain state-of-the-art conversational AI systems, ensuring high-quality, scalable, and intelligent chatbot experiences.

Key Responsibilities

 Conversational Logic & Prototypes
Design and implement AI conversational flow logic, considering potential disruptions, multiple conversation turns, and alternate conversation paths to ensure interactions are effective and meet user and business goals.
Create and manage dialogue state, entity extraction, and intent recognition models.
Build a scalable and reusable chatbot logic system using a modular design approach
 Technical Implementation & Development
Familiarity with conversation modeling techniques, including state machines, decision trees, and graph-based models.
Experience with LLM-based conversational AI, such as GPT, Claude, Gemini, and LLaMA
Ability to use frameworks like Dialogflow, Rasa, Amazon Lex, Langchain, and others to implement conversational AI solutions.
Integrate chatbots with databases, CRM systems, and enterprise APIs by collaborating with backend developers.
Enhance chatbot capabilities by writing custom scripts, API calls, and system integrations.
Develop and optimize intent classification models, slot-filling mechanisms, and context management strategies.
 Testing, Optimization, & Maintenance
Improve chatbot intent recognition and response generation through continuous training and tuning.
Optimize accuracy by analyzing user interactions, intent mismatches, and conversational breakdowns.
Develop and execute unit tests, regression tests, and A/B tests to improve chatbot performance.
Implement real-time monitoring, logging, and analytics to track performance and user satisfaction.
 Collaboration & Documentation
Collaborate with product teams to ensure chatbot functionalities align with business goals.
Work with software developers and data scientists to refine language models.
Document conversational logic, decision trees, and workflow diagrams for scalability and maintenance.


It’s a plus if you have

Experience with conversational AI voice systems
Strong understanding of vector databases, embeddings, and retrieval-based chatbot models.
Hands-on experience with embeddings, vector search, and RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation).
Understanding of knowledge graphs and their application in chatbot workflows.
Experience using machine learning techniques for intent recognition and dialogue management.
Previous work with chatbot solutions in healthcare.

Senior Prompt Engineer



Location: New York, NY | Hybrid


About GNOMI:

GNOMI is building the future of real-time information. As a News AI Agent, GNOMI delivers personalized, intelligent news experiences by leveraging multiple LLMs, proprietary data pools, and agentic workflows. Our mission is to make accurate information move faster and smarter than ever before.


We're looking for a Senior Prompt Engineer to join our fast-growing AI team and push the boundaries of what intelligent agents can do. If you speak fluent LLM and can turn language into logic, this role is for you.


About the Role:

As Senior Prompt Engineer at GNOMI, you'll work at the cutting edge of natural language systems, designing, testing, and optimizing prompts that power our core News AI agent. You’ll collaborate across engineering, product, and editorial teams to ensure our AI delivers fast, contextual, and reliable insight in response to complex news and intelligence queries.


This is a hybrid role based in New York City, with flexibility and direct access to our leadership and technical teams.


Key Responsibilities:

Design and fine-tune prompts across GPT-4, Claude, and other foundation models to deliver precise, fact-aware outputs.
Build prompt frameworks that power our real-time news summarization, Q&A, search, and agent-based workflows.
Collaborate with product and engineering to integrate prompts into production pipelines and user interfaces.
Create prompt evaluation tools and workflows to monitor quality, tone, and factual clarity.
Develop internal libraries of reusable prompt components to accelerate experimentation and scale.
Stay ahead of LLM capabilities, jailbreak risks, and emerging prompt techniques to ensure robustness and safety.
Mentor junior team members and help build a best-in-class AI interaction layer.


Qualifications:

6+ years of experience working with LLMs or NLU/NLP systems; deep understanding of prompt engineering best practices.
Proven ability to design and optimize complex multi-shot and chain-of-thought prompts for real-world use cases.

About the job
Prompt Engineer / AI Specialist (Remote)


About Us


We're a company that's obsessed with making AI actually useful for businesses. Instead of flashy demos that don't work in the real world, we build AI solutions that genuinely solve problems and make people's lives easier. Think automated sales agents that actually convert, voice bots that don't sound like robots, and research tools that save hours of manual work.


The Role


We're looking for someone who gets excited about turning "what if we could automate this?" ideas into reality. You'll be the person who figures out how to make LLMs do the heavy lifting for businesses - whether that's building outbound sales machines, creating AI assistants that handle customer calls, or developing research bots that dig up insights while people sleep.




This is 100% remote work with flexible hours. As long as you're delivering great results and available for client calls when needed, we don't care if you're most productive at 6 AM or 11 PM.




What You'll Actually Be Doing




Building Cool AI Stuff




You'll spend most of your time in n8n creating workflows that make businesses run themselves. We're talking about setting up AI agents that can handle entire sales processes, research competitors while you're having coffee, or manage social media campaigns without human babysitting. You'll be working with the latest LLMs (GPT-4, Claude, Gemini - whatever works best) and figuring out the perfect prompts to make them do exactly what we need.


The Agent Army You'll Create
Outbound Sales Agents: These bad boys qualify leads, send personalized emails, and follow up like clockwork
Voice Agents: AI that can actually have phone conversations without sounding like a robot from 1995
Research Agents: Digital detectives that dig up market insights, competitor intel, and industry trends
SEO Agents: Content optimization machines that boost search rankings while you sleep
Social Media Agents: Creative AI that posts, engages, and grows social media presence automatically


Client Magic


You'll work directly with business owners who have problems they need solved. Think of yourself as an AI translator - they tell you their pain points, you figure out how to automate the solution. Sometimes you'll need to build quick prototypes to show them what's possible, other times you'll be deep in technical documentation (but we promise to keep that fun).


Technical Wizardry


Most of your day will be in n8n building complex workflows that actually work in the real world. You'll be connecting APIs, handling data flows, setting up error handling that doesn't break at 3 AM, and making sure everything runs smoothly. When things inevitably break (because AI), you'll be the one figuring out why and fixing it.


You Should Apply If You Have


The Core Skills We Actually Need


Prompt Engineering Ninja: You know how to talk to AI models like GPT-4 and Claude to get them to do exactly what you want, not just give generic responses
n8n Master: You can build complex workflows that don't break when someone sneezes. Bonus points if you've built custom nodes or done weird integrations
AI Whisperer: You understand how LLMs work, their quirks, and how to work around their limitations without pulling your hair out
API Juggler: REST APIs, webhooks, and third-party integrations don't scare you. If it has an API, you can probably connect it to something
Code Comfortable: JavaScript or Python skills - you don't need to be a coding rockstar, but you should be able to automate stuff and debug when things go wrong
AI Platform Experience


You've actually used these tools in real projects, not just watched YouTube tutorials:
OpenAI models, Claude, Gemini, or other LLMs for actual work
AI development platforms and know which ones are worth using
Vector databases and RAG implementations (even if you just call it "making AI remember stuff")
Maybe some experience making AI models better through fine-tuning


The Soft Skills That Matter


You can explain complex AI stuff to people who think ChatGPT is magic
You don't mind jumping on calls with clients and actually enjoy solving their problems
You can manage multiple projects without everything falling apart
You understand how businesses actually work (sales, marketing, operations - the unsexy stuff that makes money)


Bonus Points If You Have


Extra Technical Superpowers


Web scraping and data extraction skills - turning the internet into your research assistant
CRM integrations (HubSpot, Salesforce) - because every business lives in their CRM
Social media APIs and automation - making brands look active without the manual work
Cloud platform experience - AWS, Google Cloud, wherever the servers live
Experience with voice AI (ElevenLabs, Azure Speech) - making AI that actually sounds human


Real-World Experience
Background in digital marketing, sales, or business automation (you've seen the problems firsthand)
Experience with SaaS companies or agencies (you know the hustle)
SEO knowledge with tools like SEMrush or Ahrefs (you understand the content game)
Understanding of how social media marketing actually works (not just posting random stuff)




Why You'll Love Working Here


Fully Remote: Work from anywhere with good internet. Your home office, a coffee shop, or that cabin in the woods - we don't care as long as you're productive
Flexible Hours: Night owl? Early bird? Work when you're most effective. We care about results, not when you clock in

About the job
Als Prompt Engineer maak je onze chatbots slimmer en persoonlijker, zodat ze klanten vriendelijker en efficiënter helpen. Je stuurt LLM’s aan met slimme prompts en bouwt prototype agents in Python met LangChain. Je analyseert de modeloutput (natuurlijk ook met AI) en verbetert met je bevindingen de agent. Zo maak je onze chatbots elke dag een beetje beter.

Wat doe je als Prompt Engineer bij Coolblue?

Als Prompt Engineer ontwerp en bouw je slimme, conversationele klantreizen. Je maakt onze chatbots elke dag een beetje slimmer en sneller, zodat klanten beter geholpen worden. Jij schrijft de prompt, bouwt het prototype en checkt op grote schaal of de uitkomsten kloppen. Je werkt dagelijks aan het maken en verbeteren van multi-agent-setups. Daarbij gebruik je frameworks zoals LangChain. Je ontwikkelt prototypes en voert systematische evaluaties uit, bijvoorbeeld met evals en LLM-as-a-judge, om de kwaliteit en prestaties van de AI te meten. Als toekomstig prompt engineer schrijf je natuurlijk jouw motivatiebrief met AI. Upload daarom geen brief, maar het prompt waarmee je die zou genereren. Zo krijgen wij alvast een voorproefje van je skills.

Intensief samenwerken met diverse domeinen om AI-toepassingen in hun vakgebied te ontdekken.
Experimenteren met nieuwe generatieve AI-modellen van bijvoorbeeld OpenAI, Google en Anthropic.
Waarde aantonen door prototypes te maken in Langchain.
Systematisch uitkomsten evalueren door prompts niet 1 keer, maar 1000 keer automatisch te testen.
Je kennis delen via demo’s, trainingen en als sparringpartner binnen Coolblue.

Een afgeronde wo-opleiding. Ervaring met AI vanuit je studie is een plus.
Minstens 3 jaar werkervaring in een technische data-gedreven omgeving, liefst in een scrumteam.

Onstilbare honger naar alles wat te maken heeft met Generative AI.
Weet ChatGPT om de tuin te leiden met je prompts. 
Analytisch en Pragmatisch en niet vies van een hacky oplossing.
Communicatief ijzersterk in het Nederlands én in het Engels.

Geld.
Meer dan 30 trainingen in onze eigen Studiefabriek.
Korting op alle spullen die we verkopen.
25 vakantiedagen. Als je belooft dat je terugkomt.
Reiskostenvergoeding en pensioenregeling.
Een kantoor waar je foto's van wilt maken op een toplocatie. Vanaf Rotterdam Centraal is het 3 keer vallen voor je er bent. Oké, het is 2 minuten lopen.

Ruimte voor nieuwe initiatieven en ideeën. Daar staan we altijd voor open. Of je nu een week, maand of een jaar bij ons werkt.
Uitdagend werk om helemaal in op te gaan, zodat je af en toe vergeet dat je aan het werk bent.
Een platte organisatie in de breedste zin van het woord. Zo kun je gewoon een biertje drinken met de baas.
